trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms class represents a CMS/PKCS #7 structure for enveloped data.
trans-unit.target: Klassen EnvelopedCms representerer en CMS/PKCS #7-struktur for omsluttede data.

trans-unit.source: The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS #7 messages with these content types.
trans-unit.target: Den kryptografiske meldingen syntaksen RFC angir følgende MIME-typer og filtyper for CMS/PKCS #7 meldinger med disse typene innhold.

trans-unit.source: |Content type|MIME type|Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedData|application/pkcs7-mime|.p7m| |signedData|application/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c|
trans-unit.target: | Innholdstype | MIME-typen | Utvidelsen | |------------------|---------------|---------------| | envelopedData | application/pkcs7-mime |. p7m | | signedData | pkcs7-program-signaturen |. p7s.p7c|

trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren EnvelopedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms>klassen har følgende standardverdier for egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo%2A>|1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>|1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC)| The default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType> for recipients is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdien | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo%2A>|&1;.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data) lengde: null | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentEncryptionAlgorithm%2A>|&1;.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC) | Standardverdien <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>for mottakere er <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentEncryptionAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> class by using the specified content information as the inner content type.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren EnvelopedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte innhold informasjonen som indre innholdstypen.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo*> class that represents the content and its type.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo*>klasse som representerer innholdet og filtypen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.ContentInfo*>

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> class by using the specified content information and encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren EnvelopedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte innhold informasjon og kryptering-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The specified content information is to be used as the inner content type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte innhold informasjonen som skal brukes som indre innholdstypen.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that represents the content and its type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer innholdet og filtypen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"></xref> object that specifies the encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"> </xref> objekt som angir krypteringsalgoritmen.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> class by using the specified subject identifier type and content information.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren EnvelopedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte emne ID-typen og innhold informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The specified content information is to be used as the inner content type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte innhold informasjonen som skal brukes som indre innholdstypen.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen standardverdiene brukes med denne konstruktøren, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Subjects can be identified by either the issuer and serial number of their public key certificate or by the key identifier of their public key certificate.
trans-unit.target: Emner kan identifiseres av utsteder og serienummeret for sine fellesnøkkelsertifikat eller key identifikatoren for sine fellesnøkkelsertifikat.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the means of identifying the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> opplisting som angir når mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that represents the content and its type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer innholdet og filtypen.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The EnvelopedCms constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> class by using the specified subject identifier type, content information, and encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren EnvelopedCms oppretter en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte emne ID-type, innhold informasjon og krypteringsalgoritme.

trans-unit.source: The specified content information is to be used as the inner content type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte innhold informasjonen som skal brukes som indre innholdstypen.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the means of identifying the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Et medlem av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> opplisting som angir når mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that represents the content and its type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer innholdet og filtypen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"></xref> object that specifies the encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"> </xref> objekt som angir krypteringsalgoritmen.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The Certificates property retrieves the set of certificates associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen sertifikater henter settet med sertifikater som er forbundet med meldingen omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that represents the X.509 certificates used with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som representerer X.509-sertifikater som brukes med omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: If no certificates exist, the property value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen sertifikater, er egenskapsverdien en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: The ContentEncryptionAlgorithm property retrieves the identifier of the algorithm used to encrypt the content.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContentEncryptionAlgorithm henter identifikatoren for algoritmen som brukes til å kryptere innholdet.

trans-unit.source: If an algorithm identifier was not set in a constructor, this property contains the default value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en algoritme-ID ikke ble angitt i en konstruktør, inneholder denne egenskapen standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms> class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: For egenskapen standardverdier brukes med <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms>klasse, se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.%23ctor> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"></xref> object that represents the algorithm identifier.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier"> </xref> objektet som representerer algoritmen-IDen.

trans-unit.source: The ContentInfo property retrieves the inner content information for the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContentInfo henter informasjon om indre innhold for omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: If you call any of the decrypt methods, such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt>, before viewing this property, the content returned is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller en av metodene dekryptere for eksempel <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt>, før du viser denne egenskapen, krypteres innhold som returneres.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"></xref> object that represents the inner content information from the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.ContentInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer indre innhold informasjonen fra omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The Decode method decodes the specified enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message and resets all member variables in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekod dekoder angitte omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen og tilbakestiller alle medlemsvariabler i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called before <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt?displayProperty=fullName> or any other EnvelopedCms.Decrypt method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles før <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt?displayProperty=fullName>eller en annen EnvelopedCms.Decrypt-metode.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that represent the information to be decoded.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med verdier for byte som representerer informasjonen som skal dekodes.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method decrypts the contents of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere dekrypterer innholdet meldingens dekodede omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method searches the current user and computer My stores for the appropriate certificate and private key.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søker i den gjeldende brukeren og datamaskinen min butikker for det riktige sertifikatet og den private nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be called before Decrypt or any other <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>må kalles før dekryptere eller andre <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt%2A>metode.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decrypt%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method does not search the computer My store if it is inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søker ikke datamaskinen min store hvis den er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to access the decryption key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til dekrypteringsnøkkelen:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method decrypts the contents of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the private key associated with the certificate identified by the specified recipient information.
trans-unit.target: De dekryptere metoden dekrypterer innholdet i dekodede omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen ved hjelp av den private nøkkelen som er forbundet med sertifikatet som ble identifisert av den angitte mottakerne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to access the decryption key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til dekrypteringsnøkkelen:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object that represents the recipient information that identifies the certificate associated with the private key to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer mottakeren informasjonen som identifiserer sertifikatet som er tilknyttet den private nøkkelen som brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method decrypts the contents of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere dekrypterer innholdet i dekodede omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen ved hjelp av angitte sertifikatet-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method searches the specified certificate collection and the My certificate store for the proper certificate to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søkes det angitte sertifikatsamlingen og Min sertifikatlageret for det riktige sertifikatet som brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to access the decryption key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til dekrypteringsnøkkelen:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that represents additional certificates to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som representerer flere sertifikater til å bruke dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method searches this certificate collection and the My certificate store for the proper certificate to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søker denne sertifikatsamlingen og Min sertifikatlageret for det riktige sertifikatet som brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method decrypts the contents of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the private key associated with the certificate identified by the specified recipient information and by using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere dekrypterer innholdet i dekodede omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen ved hjelp av den private nøkkelen som er knyttet til sertifikatet som er identifisert av den angitte mottakerne informasjonen og ved å bruke den angitte sertifikatsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method searches the specified certificate collection and the My certificate store for the proper certificate to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søkes det angitte sertifikatsamlingen og Min sertifikatlageret for det riktige sertifikatet som brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to access the decryption key: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å få tilgang til dekrypteringsnøkkelen:- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object that represents the recipient information to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> objektet som representerer informasjon om mottakeren skal brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that represents additional certificates to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som representerer flere sertifikater til å bruke dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method searches this certificate collection and the My certificate store for the proper certificate to use for the decryption.
trans-unit.target: Metoden dekryptere søker denne sertifikatsamlingen og Min sertifikatlageret for det riktige sertifikatet som brukes for dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Encode method encodes the contents of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message and returns it as an array of byte values.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kode koder innholdet meldingens omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7, og returnerer den som en matrise med byteverdier.

trans-unit.source: Encryption must be done before encoding.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering må gjøres før koding.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt?displayProperty=fullName> or another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt%2A> method must be called before this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt?displayProperty=fullName>eller en annen <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt%2A>metoden må kalles før denne metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encrypt?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Encode method does not cause the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to be populated.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kode fører ikke til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å være utfylt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the method returns an array of byte values that represent the encoded information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden lykkes, returnerer metoden en matrise med verdier for byte som representerer kodet informasjon.

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden mislykkes, oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: Et metodekall er ugyldig for objektets gjeldende tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter krypterer innholdet i CMS/PKCS #7-melding.

trans-unit.source: This method displays a user interface in which you choose the recipients for whom to encrypt the message.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser et brukergrensesnitt der du velge mottakerne som til å kryptere meldingen.

trans-unit.source: This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the <xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever at den gjeldende prosessen kjører i *bruker interaktiv modus*, mening som den <xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application.
trans-unit.target: En prosess er vanligvis bruker interaktiv modus med mindre det er en service prosess eller kjører i et webprogram.

trans-unit.source: The user interface will only present certificates that are within their validity period and that have key encipherment or key agreement included in their key usage.
trans-unit.target: Brukergrensesnittet vises bare sertifikater som er i sine gyldighetsperiode og som har nøkkelkryptering eller key avtale som er inkludert i sin nøkkelbruk.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method does not cause the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to be populated.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter fører ikke til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å være utfylt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: .NET framework-sikkerhet følgende tillatelser kreves for å vise brukergrensesnittet:-<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the specified recipient information.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter krypterer innholdet i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen ved hjelp av den angitte mottakerne informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method does not cause the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to be populated.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter fører ikke til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å være utfylt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> objektet som representerer informasjon om mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS #7 message by using the information for the specified list of recipients.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter krypterer innholdet i CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen ved hjelp av informasjonen for den angitte listen over mottakere.

trans-unit.source: The message is encrypted by using a message encryption key with a symmetric encryption algorithm such as triple DES.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen er kryptert ved hjelp av en melding-krypteringsnøkkel med en symmetriske krypteringsalgoritmen som tre DES.

trans-unit.source: The message encryption key is then encrypted with the public key of each recipient.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen krypteringsnøkkelen krypteres deretter med fellesnøkkelen for hver mottaker.

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method does not cause the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to be populated.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Krypter fører ikke til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å være utfylt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection that represents the information for the list of recipients.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> samling som representerer informasjon for listen over mottakere.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: En null-referanse ble sendt til en metode som ikke tillater som et gyldig argument.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk operasjon kan ikke fullføres.

trans-unit.source: The RecipientInfos property retrieves the recipient information associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RecipientInfos henter mottakeren informasjonen for omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7-meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Although this property is read-only, a modification to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo> objects in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection> can be done by using their properties.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet, en endring i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo>objekter i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection>kan utføres ved hjelp av sine egenskaper.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo>

trans-unit.source: The RecipientInfos property is not populated as a result of calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method nor any of the overloaded EnvelopedCms.Encrypt methods.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RecipientInfos ikke fylt ut som et resultat av kaller den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden eller overbelastet EnvelopedCms.Encrypt-metoder.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection that represents the recipient information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> samling som representerer informasjon om mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: If no recipients exist, the property value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen mottakere, er egenskapsverdien en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: The UnprotectedAttributes property retrieves the unprotected (unencrypted) attributes associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen UnprotectedAttributes henter beskyttet (kryptert) attributtene som er forbundet med meldingen omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: Unprotected attributes are not encrypted, and so do not have data confidentiality within an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ubeskyttet attributter er ikke kryptert, og slik ikke har data konfidensiell i en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"></xref> collection that represents the unprotected attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"> </xref> samling som representerer attributtene ubeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: If no unprotected attributes exist, the property value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen ubeskyttet attributter, er egenskapsverdien en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: The Version property retrieves the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Version henter versjonen av omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.

trans-unit.source: The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message.
trans-unit.target: Versjonen bestemmer om meldingen er et PKCS #7-melding eller en kryptografisk melding syntaksen (CMS)-melding.

trans-unit.source: CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
trans-unit.target: CMS er nyere overordnet PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: An int value that represents the version of the enveloped CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: En heltallsverdi som representerer versjonen av omsluttede CMS/PKCS #7 meldingen.
